title: Nighthawks. What can I do with a male nude?
creator_contributor_role: Museum of the Moving Image (BFI), distributor
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Gay and lesbian studies
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Homosexuality in motion pictures
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Coming out (Sexual orientation)
description: 'Nighthawks' pictures the everyday experiences of a homosexual schoolteacher in a film which is both a subjective account of the teacher's disjointed emotional life, and a record of the gay scene in London towards the end of the 1970's. 'What can I do with a male nude?' is a witty short film showing the point of view of a gay photographer as he photographs a muscular male model.
